summary: Missing the Oblivion\'s greaves? Want a customized style beyond the skyrim limits? Tired of those arrow in your knee? Let the greaves make their returns!
descriptionHtml:
The Greaves ( or Leggings ) are back!


Actual Version : 1.2
- Added a Non-replacer version, all the armor can be created at the Forge,including a \"wearable\" nude Torso and Legs.
- Added A quickfix for the Esp of the Replacer version, the non-replacer already include it.

Since the release of Skyrim,something always felt missing in the game...something Oblivion Had,and Skyrim didn\'t... your trusty greaves!
This mod modify most of the vanilla armor to allow separated use of the Top and bottom part of each armor, Wear your armor with style,and see your enemies do the same!

Affected Armor : 
Bandit
Daedric
DragonBone
DragonScale
Dwarven
Ebony
Elven
Glass
Hide
Iron
Iron banded
Nord/Steel
Orcish
Steel
Leather
Draugr
Falmer
Companions

For Male and Female character!

Thats almost all the armor ingame, I decided to avoid edit the other one, because they were too much affected by script.

You may get a better feel if you start a new game with this mod ( although it\'s not required... the only problem is that most characters will appear without pants! Wait 3 days in-game and/or use Resurrect on the characters to fix that. )

To install, drop Leggings Return.Esp and LeggingsReturn.Bsa in your data folder, check LeggingsReturn in your Skyrim Data files and launch the game!

Version history :
1.2 - Standalone Release
1.1 - Various Bug Fix 
1.0 - Initial release

Conflict : 
Most of the custom armor will cause some issue ( your character legs will appear two times ), but wearing the \"leggings compatibility\" items will fix that!
It also modify a bit the Character body.
And finally,item from other mod using the slot 53 may cause issue.
author: Topvman
